RegexpUtil - Class in org.netbeans.api.search
Helper for creating regular expression patterns for file-name patterns that are specified in search options.
relevantNodeSelected(Node) - Method in class org.netbeans.spi.search.provider.DefaultSearchResultsDisplayer.ResultNodeShiftSupport
This method is called when a relevant node is selected by pressing Next or Previous button.
